Plot: Humberto Fuentes is a wealthy doctor whose wife has recently died. In spite of the advice of his children, he takes a trip to visit his former students who now work in impoverished villages...
Language: Spanish, Italian, English, Nahuatl, Maya, Tzotzil, Kuna
Title: Men with Guns
Actors: Federico Luppi, Damián Delgado, Dan Rivera González, Tania Cruz
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 3 nominations.
